content.rendered:
When the most terrible tyrants and criminal masterminds in history gather to start a war and wipe out millions of people from the face of the earth, only one man can race against time to stop them.

Director: Matthew Vaughn

Writers: Matthew Vaughn. Karl Gajdusek. Mark Millar

Stars: Ralph Fiennes. Gemma Arterton. Rhys Ifans
